summary: The TRON Grand Hackathon draws on some of crypto’s most prestigious institutions to offer their expert discernment on which projects will accelerate the growth of the TRON and BTTC ecosystem.
title: TRON Grand Hackathon 2022 Season 3 Features 40+ Partners and Judges
content: Geneva, Switzerland / October 11 / – TRON DAO and BitTorrent Chain (BTTC) are excited to continue into Season 3 of this year’s TRON Grand Hackathon with more than 40 distinguished partners and judges. Each partner can have at least one judge representative and is encouraged to consider individual grants for projects they deem worthy.

The TRON Grand Hackathon draws crypto’s most prestigious institutions to offer their expert discernment on which projects will accelerate the growth of the TRON and BTTC ecosystem. Our judges will be keeping the bar high in order to attract quality projects with utility that users can benefit from. Each judge works at a major institution across and outside of the blockchain industry, and together they bring along years of experience that applicants can in turn leverage.
The TRON DAO is focused on inviting top-tier partners to help better our Hackathon every season. Here are some of our returning partners and judges for Season 3:
The TRON Grand Hackathon is always looking to expand its reach of great collaborations, and we are proud to announce some new partners and judges to our lineup for Season 3:
The TRON DAO has partnered with aWSB to bring in more partners and judges for our Ecosystem track, with some of them listed below:
Click here for a complete list of partners and judges for Season 3.
For further details, please visit the TRON DAO Forum, TRONS3.Devpost.com, and TRONDAO.org/hackathon.
